    • module:AssetUser

    module:AssetUser

    Class that acts as an interface/abstract class for any class requiring assets. Please avoid instantiating directly.
    Create an AssetUser instance (fails unless overridden).
    Source:
    • assetUser.mjs, line 10

    Methods

    getAssetPaths() → {array}

    Source:
    • assetUser.mjs, line 26
    Returns:
    Type:
    array
    Array of path strings or plain objects with a "path" and "reviver" function (for JSON).

    onAssetsLoaded(assets)

    Event handler function - Store downloaded assets.
    Source:
    • assetUser.mjs, line 34
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    assets Object Plain object that works as an associative array. Each item key is a path from "getAssetPaths()".
